info.+content: In a world where ESP is common, only three people have them at the highest possible level—Level 7. Those three are the special ESP team, The Children. The Children work for BABEL, a special ESPer organization committed to stopping crimes before they happen. Kouichi Minamoto is assigned to watch over them, and he'll need to, because three superpowered ten-year-olds are a problem on their own.
#1: "Zettai love×love Sengen!!" (絶対love×love 宣言!!) by Aya Hirano, Ryoko Shiraishi & Haruka Tomatsu
#2: "DATTE Daihonmei" (DATTE大本命) by Aya Hirano, Ryoko Shiraishi & Haruka Tomatsu
#3: "Break+Your+Destiny" by Koji Yusa, Yuuichi Nakamura and Kishou Taniyama
#4: "Sōshunfu" (早春賦) by Aya Hirano, Ryoko Shiraishi & Haruka Tomatsu
